name: British Airways Business Class Club World, 747 Upper Deck - Chicago (ORD) to London Heathrow (LHR)
description:
In this video, I travel from chilly Chicago to London on the early overnight flight in Club World, business class. Includes all the usual highlights; the lounge, airport, boarding, and all phases of flight - especially the food(!).

Also featured - the Arrivals Lounge at London Heathrow.

Enjoy the video, and leave a comment. Thanks!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
